The old Feral Warwick was a big change when it was first released. It set a precedent for a totally different body type. The original Warwick was quite skinny and thin, but Feral Warwick looked like a hulking monster - totally unleashed. He was a madman unchained, his collar and the broken shackles on his wrist, plus the scars on his back and his huge muscles.

The new one is just more of the same except with "insane asylum straightjacket stuff" instead of "ice stuff" or "Fire stuff" or "mad max car stuff" 

It doesn't stand out like it used to, it doesn't change his body type or add any new or different dimensions. Ironically, however, Tundra Hunter used to literally just be a white recolor, and is now very different. It adds scars, an ice arm, the ice spike on his back, armor and all kinds of goodies. 

I guess some people just want a bulky/muscular Warwick or something that's totally different like the original Feral was (at the time of release) compared to his "normal stature".
